comment: I love this moon face watch,I have the free version just now but will definitely upgrade,not sure how to do this yet,maybe I have to uninstall app and install again,thanks upgraded on 10/8/15

reply.author: NOWAWEB
reply.content:
Hello Sandy,
thank you for your nice feedback.
To upgrade, open the Android Wear app and tap on LunaWatch. You'll see then the settings page of it and there is (at upper right) a green button which is called 'buy'. Tap on it to buy the premium settings and your upgrade is done.
